messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] book about Japan
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the christmas present Professor Solomon! Daniele ... From: profsol2000  To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tuesday,
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the christmas present Professor Solomon!
Daniele

----- Original Message ----
From: profsol2000 <profsol22@...>
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, December 26, 2006 12:15:09 AM
Subject: [samuraihistory] book about Japan













I am the author and publisher of "Japan in a Nutshell"--a guide to the

traditional culture of Japan. (Includes a chapter on Bushido, with a

tale of Bokuden.) To download a free copy of my book, go to:



http://www.professo rsolomon. com/japanbookpag e.html



It's a PDF file (23 MB) with illustrations.



Professor Solomon

Baltimore

messages.msgSnippet: I am the author and publisher of Japan in a Nutshell --a guide to the traditional culture of Japan. (Includes a chapter on Bushido, with a tale of Bokuden.)
messages.messageBody:
I am the author and publisher of "Japan in a Nutshell"--a guide to the
traditional culture of Japan. (Includes a chapter on Bushido, with a
tale of Bokuden.) To download a free copy of my book, go to:

http://www.professorsolomon.com/japanbookpage.html

It's a PDF file (23 MB) with illustrations.

Professor Solomon
Baltimore
